snippet: When the disgraced former banker Dominique Strauss-Kahn indulged in orgies, was he simply a free-spirited libertine following in a notorious tradition dating back centuries and pervasive in French culture?
abstract: When the disgraced former banker Dominique Strauss-Kahn indulged in orgies, was he simply a free-spirited libertine following in a notorious tradition dating back centuries and pervasive in French culture?
